1588980.name: Fantasy Grounds - World of Farland Campaign Setting
1588980.description:
World of
Farland Campaign Setting

Our gold best-selling

World of Farland Campaign Setting
is now available for Fantasy Grounds VTT!
The World of Farland has been online for over 20 years, and it has been offered for 3.5e, 4e, and recently 5e. It mixes dark and gritty fantasy with classic and high fantasy. Now, because the fans demanded it, we bring you a highly detailed campaign source book that gives you everything you need to run a game in Farland that is compatible with the
5
th
edition of the world's most popular RPG.
Farland is a world that has been conquered by evil. It has been sundered into seven kingdoms, each ruled by an evil lord who personifies one of the seven deadly sins. These beings, called the
Lords of Sin , hold the land in a dark grasp. In the conquered kingdoms, the Lords of Sin enslaved the population and made their primary activity in life the glorification of the Dark God Vornoth. Farland is an evil place, but take heart, for not all is lost-- light glimmers in the West. A rebellion has broken out, and several kingdoms have been freed, although they are teetering on the brink of collapse, and all-out war with the dark powers is looming....
This product includes:
  • Information about Geography and Climate
  • Details about the free and occupied human kingdoms
  • Detailed cities and towns of Farland
  • Info about culture and society
  • Calendars of Farland
  • Currencies of all kingdoms
  • Languages
  • Proverbs and sayings
  • Direction for running an ongoing campaign, plus tons of adventure hooks
  • Factions for all kingdoms and races
  • Lore on good and evil demi-humans
  • The unique pantheons of Farland
  • Important NPCs and monsters
  • Other continents found on the planet
  • A large, detailed political map of the Continent of Farland
  • Much more!
It allows you to immediately incorporate all of the World of Farland Campaign information into your Fantasy Grounds VTT game! This also works with Fantasy Grounds Unity.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
Jason Hathaway
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and the included 5E Compatible ruleset. Compatible with Fantasy Grounds Unity
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
